text: hum ne har ummath mein rasool bheja ke (logo!) sirf Allah ki ibaadath karo aur us ke siva tamaam maabudHo se bacho, pas baaz logo ko to Allah taâ€™ala ne hidayath di aur baaz par gumraahi saabith ho gayi, pas tum khud zameen mein chal phir kar dekh lo ke jhutlaane walo ka anjaam kaisa kuch hoa
